title: A LAUNDRY DELIVERY APPARATUS AND A METHOD FOR DELIVERING LAUNDRY
fig_desc: In the case of the second surface 3 being defined by a belt conveyor as shown in fig 1.a, the belts will flex or yield, thereby allowing a nipping region 4 to compensate for laundries of different thickness
all_fig_descs: In the case of the second surface 3 being defined by a belt conveyor as shown in fig 1.a, the belts will flex or yield, thereby allowing a nipping region 4 to compensate for laundries of different thickness
